description:
The thing that finally stops Myr`s rampage is a memento Seth found, left behind for him by Jill. Seeing new life growing before him, Myr finally finds hope again. After beginning to question the Inquisition`s intentions through this war, Dragunov returns to Bome to question General Torque. The long battle is over. All the people of Caislean Merlin gather as Queen Boudica declares an end to old conventions and appoints a new queen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mirai wa Kimi to Tomo ni: Eternity
The Future Is with You: Eternity
